title: Associated type bounds ICE

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust #![feature(associated_type_bounds)] struct Bug(T); impl Bug> {} ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` 1.68.0-nightly (8a97b4812 2022-12-22) ``` ### Error output ``` [](error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_middle/src/ty/mod.rs:2133:13: item_name: no name for DefPath { data: [DisambiguatedDefPathData { data: Impl, disambiguator: 0 }], krate: crate0 }) ```
